content.body: We just released Ada URL's v3.0.0. It includes URLPattern which is 100% spec compliant. http://github.com/ada-url/ada
Node.js will land URLPattern as well. Either today or tomorrow. https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/56452
keithamus: FYI I would be fine with a single dialog rearrange PR, if that's easier :)
content.formatted_body: keithamus: FYI I would be fine with a single dialog rearrange PR, if that's easier :)

content.body:
It might be kinda nice if you could do something like

> Let _comments_ be _options_["comments"] with fallback false.

so you don't have to map/exists all the time.
content.formatted_body:
It might be kinda nice if you could do something like

Let comments be options["comments"] with fallback false.

so you don't have to map/exists all the time.
